# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
